source: IFsLI (400 nm, 35 fs, 500 Hz) in ambient air
mechanism: intense ultrafast excitation induces lattice distortion and defect generation
O fills/passivates VSe; WOx forms under IFsLI

citations.section: XPS WOx peaks; DFT formation energy OSe

mechanism: electron transfer to adjacent WSe2 regions; WO3 becomes hole-dominant

citations.section: PL/Raman n-type; TA overlap with WO3

mechanism: critical threshold before full Mott regime
high carrier density drives pronounced spectral/electronic changes
graphene blocks O participation; raises barrier to surface oxidation
